mapper.sql: id, circle_no, circle_host_no, circle_name, circle_theme, circle_label, image, create_by, update_by, create_at, update_at
mapper.select:
select
from t_circle where circleName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{circleName},'%')) order by create_at desc

select
from t_circle where circleName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{circleName},'%')) and circle_host_no = #{circleHostNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by create_at desc

select tc.circle_no AS circleNo, tc.circle_host_no AS circleHostNo, tc.circle_name AS circleName, tc.circle_theme AS circleTheme, tc.circle_label AS circleLabel, tc.image AS image, tc.create_at AS createAt from t_circle AS tc LEFT JOIN t_circle_user AS tcu ON tc.circle_no = tcu.circle_no LEFT JOIN t_user_info AS tui ON tcu.user_id = tui.user_id
AND tc.circleName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{circleName},'%'))
and tui.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by tc.create_at desc

SELECT tui.user_id AS userId, tui.user_real_name AS userRealName, tui.person_image AS personImage FROM t_circle AS tc LEFT JOIN t_circle_user AS tcu ON tc.circle_no = tcu.circle_no LEFT JOIN t_user_info AS tui ON tcu.user_id = tui.user_id WHERE tc.circle_no = #{circleNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by tcu.create_at desc
